HEXplorer.details:
revision 0.7.14 (Q1/2017) : TODO: - improvement : inform user when opening a WD on the net which takes a lot of time. - improvement : display/compare/copy choosing Phys or Hex values.
DONE: - improvement : Qt5.8.0 - improvement : Qt Data Visualization.
revision 0.7.13 (Q4/2016) : - improvement : automatic check for updates on Github. - improvement : create persistent directory directly in treeView. - improvement : copy/paste from a folder to another. - improvement : compare a2l - measurement channels. - improvement : manage better end of file in A2L. - improvement : copy/paste dataset in treeview. - improvement : function save dataset improved. - improvement : action "duplicate" dataset, do no save changes in original file and paste new with differences. - improvement : "save_as" dataset create a new node instead of renaming original. - improvement : display files in treeview into OS harddisk file manager. - improvement : shortcut "F5" for reload working directory. - bug correction : CVX/CDFX with FIX_AXIS for curves and maps. - bug correction : improve CVX parser to better fit to CVX_SPEC.DOC V2.1 and Inca format. - bug correction : CDFX,DCM parsing errors. - bug correction : A2L containing lots of blank lines (out of memory Quex). - bug correction : duplicate dataset when changes are in. - bug correction : display menu delete file when selecting a non-read data file. - bug correction : when "save as" data file, retrieve the correct treemodel path. - bug correction : update workingdirectory and read a2l with char or meas edited from a2l previously read.
revision 0.7.12 (Q3/2016) : - bug correction : ensure files are still present on disk before parsing. - bug correction : application crash when quicklook file after editing characterisitics of the related a2l. - bug correction : prevent 2 different a2l files with the same fileName to have the same path in treeview model. - bug correction : importing dcm where ST/X or ST/Y are splitted in more lines. - bug correction : treeview display sorted when using subfolder. - bug correction : quicklook cdfx point on cdfx and not dcm. - Improvement : lineEdit for treeView search => expand corrisponding node. - bug corection : edit label from diff label after compare. - bug correction : read dcm file when label not in dataset available. - bug correction : edit dcm file as text. - Improvement : allow display folder under WorkProject in Treeview. - Improvement : display characteristics and Measuring channels. - bug correction : plot with csv.
revision 0.7.11 (Q2/2016) : - use of Qt5.7.0 - Improvement : read damos .dcm files. - Improvement : modify the way a WorkingDirectory is open (Use of class QDir instead of QFileSystemModel). - bug correction : when modifying a characteristic with compu_method = NO_COMPU_METHOD. - bug correction : Group Cur or Map resizing. - bug correction : treeView update issue => class WorkProject inheriting from class Node. - bug correction : BIT_MASK usage with datatype LONG. - bug correction : datatype bitwidth hardcoded instead of being read in a2l in ALIGNMENT_ORDER.
revision 0.7.10 (06/2016) : - bug correction : a2l parser for float interpretation - bug correction : wrong value displayed in quicklook for VL_BLK and srec files. - bug correction : compare hex/srec file and csv/cdfx whis a given list of labels with some missing into the .csv/.cdfx file - bug correction : function "display as bit" when csv or cdfx file is open in quicklook.
revision 0.7.9 (04/2016) : - bug correction related to opening VSC in release 0.7.8.
revision 0.7.8 (04/2016) : - bug correction related too closing more WorkingDirectories at the same time - precision error when converting a data from hex to phys with Mingw compiler
revision 0.7.7 (04/2016) : - bugs correction related to 3D openGL - bugs correction related to opening an HEXfile when a2l file could not be read properly due t miising keywords. - QwtPlot3D library "re-"added
revision 0.7.6 (04/2016) : - STATIC_RECORD_LAYOUT keyword added
revision 0.7.1 (10/2015) : - use of std::algorithms instead of qalgorithm
revision 0.7.0 (09/2015) : - use of Qt 5.5.0 - compiled with MinGW - add new keywords to be more compliant with ASAP2 - implement openMP and lexer as app propriety - bug corected wuth Quex exceptions a token is unknown - replaced Qwtplot3D lib with MathGL library
revision 0.6.11 (02/09/2012) : - use of Qt 4.8.2 - A2L parser improvements (new keywords) - import/export Srec files - edit compared labels into context menu - some bug fixes!
revision 0.6.10 (02/04/2012) : - bug fix : update in function verify
revision 0.6.9 (04/12/2011) : - bug fix : Quex lexer for indentifier with brackets - add Root and Sub_Group nodes
revision 0.6.8 (16/11/2011) : - bug fix : edit value Val_Wu32
revision 0.6.7 (18/10/2011) : - HTTP updater - proxy setting
revision 0.6.6 (12/10/2011) : - bug correction when no target Hex file defined to copy
revision 0.6.5 (06/10/2011) : - bug correction when reading Hex for DCU datsaset
revision 0.6.4 (06/10/2011) : - bug correction when importing DCU a2l (IF_DATA block) - CHARACTERISTIC unit out of the name
revision 0.6.3 (27/09/2011) : - bug correction when mismatch A2L / Hex version
revision 0.6.2 (22/09/2011) : - Hex file import optimization
revision 0.6.1 (21/09/2011) : - bug fix when parsing String into A2L file (changes into Quex Regular expression)
revision 0.6.0 (20/09/2011) : - correction into a2l compare ("new subsets"...) - speed improvement into import hex file
revision 0.5.4 (19/09/2011) : - bug fix (axis_pts from CSV with values higher than extended_limits)
revision 0.5.3 (16/09/2011) : - bug fix (modify ASCII data) - bug fix (reference counting when close project)
revision 0.5.2 (15/09/2011) : - bug fix (change group Map and save hex file)
revision 0.5.1 (14/09/2011) : - bug fix - read HEX file improvements
revision 0.5.0 (09/09/2011) : - use Qt 4.7.4 - speed improvements (Quex lexical analyser,...) - bug fixes
revision 0.4.23 (12/08/2011) : - use Qwtplot 6.0.1 - set disable bits when display labels as bit
revision 0.4.22 (19/07/2011) : - bug fix A2L compare
revision 0.4.21 (19/07/2011) : - bug fix when copy cdfx file into hex file
revision 0.4.20 (18/07/2011) : - compare A2L files - cosmetics...
revision 0.4.19 (24/05/2011) : - upgrade to Qt 4.7.3 - legend into graph for verify corrected
revision 0.4.18 (16/05/2011) : - bug fix when reading Csv file when values are outside extended_limits - bug fix into combobox delegate for source curve
revision 0.4.17 (20/04/2011) : - paste correction from excel
revision 0.4.16 (15/04/2011) : - correct bug when copy csv and resetView
revision 0.4.15 (12/04/2011) : - correct display color when change z value into map in formCompare - copy/paste after ctrl-A into label corrected
revision 0.4.14 (05/04/2011) : - improve copy/paste - resize more columns at once - edit and change directly in hex values
revision 0.4.13 (01/04/2011) : - output log window resizeable - paste from excel quicker - remove quote from compu_vtab (easier when copy/paste into Excel) - export not found label list at compare - currentItem/SelecedItem after resetView() - correct bug when right click into measModel - edit characteristic list into view - choose label into subset (example : /C101/Inj*map)
revision 0.4.11 (29/03/2011) : - do not display label as changed when set at original size
revision 0.4.10 (25/03/2011) : - release after new re-compilation to correct problem by "verify"
revision 0.4.9 (24/03/2011) : - improve search labels with description - add / remove breakpoint menu activation - compare / copy csv values when axis not defined
revision 0.4.8 (16/03/2011) : - use of Qt 4.7.2 new release
revision 0.4.7 (15/03/2011) : - possibility to add/remove breakpoints
revision 0.4.6 (09/03/2011) : - progress bar save as Hex file - bug fix : Hex, Cdf and csv owners list when attach and detach
revision 0.4.5 (09/03/2011) : - display max label size when size is smaller than max size into ASAP file - add ASAP file name into Csv export as comment - save the csv or cdfxpath when export subset - display different constant value bold
revision 0.4.4 (01/03/2011) : - item MAX_REFRESH added into ASAP file parser - correct bug when import Csv values (destructor called twice) - progressBar importing/exporting Csv
revision 0.4.3 (25/02/2011) : - bugs and error correction
